website_summaries.verdict: The Logitech Bluetooth keyboard case for the Tab S 10.5 is a compact way to add an extra level of protection to your slate, but the build quality of the keyboard is too cheap to justify its $100/£90 starting price.
pros: The Logitech Bluetooth keyboard case for the Samsung Galaxy Tab S 10.5 sports a slim and lightweight water-resistant build
The tablet securely fits inside the case and the keyboard keys are comfortable to type on
cons: The plastic keyboard is fragile and attracts smudges

customer_reviews.title: Slightly tight, coincidentally the wifi hardware stopped..??
customer_reviews.text: I had this case and loved loved loved it and then accidentally broke the keyboard and needed another. When I put this on, it felt just a hair too tight but I went ahead and snapped it in. I take it out of the case pretty frequently. After about 3 days of snapping this in and taking it out, the wifi was gone. It wasn't the software and I can't help but wonder if the hardware broke from the stress on the tablet. Anyway, other than this coincidence, I've always loved this case, it's lightweight, great keyboard size and never falls down when it's propped open.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Amazing battery life
customer_reviews.text: I really love this and the battery life is so amazing. I have charged 2 times in 4 months. I do go days without using but forget to power it off and it is still charged. I only have issues with it standing up sometimes it will fall easy but still not bad. Holds mypen very well. Would highly recommend for the price. Sometimes a little lag
customer_reviews.author: MLewis

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard - paired fast and has good tactile feedback
customer_reviews.text: This has worked perfectly and exactly as I expected. It paired instantly and functioned perfectly with both the built-in and with SwiftKey keyboard apps. The tactile feedback is good and even though the keyboard is slightly smaller than standard, I have had no problem touch typing. I would appreciate a double width backspace key, but this is a small request.
customer_reviews.author: TechGuy 007

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last two months. No longer eligible for return
customer_reviews.text: Update: Company responded and has offered a full refund even though I only asked for an exchange. Good customer service. Great product worked great for less than two months. Now some of the keys have stopped working. Not eligible for return. Have contacted seller. We will see how their customer service is.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Best Samsung Galaxy Tab S10.5 Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Best Samsung Galaxy Tab S10.5 keyboard out there. Easy to type on, blue tooth connects reliably, battery lasts longer than I can remember when last charged. I just charge once a month to be safe. Used tablet/keyboard/case every day for years. Hardly ever use laptop anymore. After years of use, keyboard/case still protected my tablet when I recently dropped tablet. Case took the hit, cracked the case not the tablet. Just replaced keyboard/case....makes tablet seem brand new!
customer_reviews.author: Atalie C.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy construction
customer_reviews.text: Great looking case for the price. Good protection for my Galaxy. Came fast and quick to install. Keyboard connects flawlessly(Bluetooth). Wish the keyboard was backlit for night use :-( but still pretty nice for the cost!
customer_reviews.author: ramos,corinne

customer_reviews.title: Works really great!
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard case has a long lasting battery, easily sinks up to my tablet, and keeps up to my speed of typing as well. Great buy and great product easy to use and it feels like a real keyboard from Lap top.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this used and it came almost like new. Keyboard is efficient and everything fits perfectly along with ports and speakers. I have a glass screen protector but haven't noticed any scratches or scuffs on the glass
customer_reviews.author: Sandmann

customer_reviews.title: Excellent keyboard. Works well
customer_reviews.text: Excellent keyboard. Works well, is lightweight and the layout is not too cramped. I would like to see three improvements: 1. Logitech should have used something other than their glossy black plastic for the keyboard body. IT SCRATCHES VERY EASILY! Simply wiping it off with a tissue caused dim spots. Very poor choice for a finish. 2. I would have liked to have seen function keys to adjust screen brightness. Other keyboards have this functionality and I would give up some keys for brightness keys. 3. Back-light keys!!! Overall, I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: The batteries doesn't last long enough on this product
customer_reviews.text: I loved the colors, size, but the power goes out in 3 hours! and doesn't last longer with out a plug. And plus didn't have a book with it when arrive, so if anyone can tell me why the power goes out fast even if I am not using it would be nice! and how can a manual for it? Other that I loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Collins

customer_reviews.title: Logitech packaging is not sealed.  My be missing parts.
customer_reviews.text: The package that Logitech supplies is not sealed but only closed by a magnet and could hardly be called sustainable packaging. This would not matter much but the unit I got had been opened and handled by someone unfamiliar with keyboards or hand soap. Again this can't really hurt, but then I find the charging cable is missing because the package is not sealed. I guess the last user found what he or she was looking for. I will have to go to Micro Center or even Best Buy (while they last) so I can see what I'm getting. Logitech packaging is responsible for this.
customer_reviews.author: Plungerman

customer_reviews.title: ) We like it and use it
customer_reviews.text: It works and works well. It is compact enough to fit in the same carrier that I used with the $100 dollar Samsung bluetooth keyboard designed specifically for out tablet (and failed in a little over a year and Samsung was totally clueless in helping me get it fixed.) We like it and use it. Note this was listed by Logitech as costing $99. We paid ~$20 but didn't get a charger. I'm not complaining. :-)
customer_reviews.author: sunny

customer_reviews.title: Great but with a major missing feature
customer_reviews.text: Feels and behaves like a high-quality product. If it had a magnet to stop the cover from sliding when folded back I would have given this 5 stars -- that's how annoying it is to have the tablet squish around when trying to hold it in such a position. Most other cases have such magnets; I'm seriously bewildered as to how they left this out of the design.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Ejsmont

customer_reviews.title: Excellent keyboard for Tab S.
customer_reviews.text: This Bluetooth keyboard is high quality and well designed. The battery life is incredible. It has function keys for opening different apps on the Tab S. You can easily turn it off allowing you to quickly use the screen keyboard when that is more appropriate. It fits, though a bit tightly in my Evercase Multi-functional Neoprene Messenger Case Tote Bag for the Tab S. Because the case will fray the rounded edges of the keyboard I coated the keyboard material at these places with a little superglue. Problem solved!
customer_reviews.author: Michael J.

customer_reviews.title: keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Logitech keyboard instead of the following products came. The following products would come on wednesday. Good day. Wireless Security Camera 1080P,180 Degree Panoramic Camera with Motion Detection,Night Vision,Two-Way Audio,Home Security WiFi IP Camera for Office/Baby/Nanny/Pet Monitor (2 Pack)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could not get it to work
customer_reviews.text: Could never get this to connect to the Galaxy Tab S since the Bluetooth connection would only be "open" for a few seconds, never enough time to enter the whole code.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher K.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, nice quality. Only thing not working for me well is when I fold it over to use as tablet, I have to manually fuddle around to switch the keyboard off. Perfect would have included the ability to sense for backlit keys. Only real gripe I have is the angle for viewing is not adjustable. Would be nice if Logitech came up with a dual power cable or something for charging. Have not seen a better case cover out there.
customer_reviews.author: Kim P

customer_reviews.title: beautiful finish and quality material
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cover and bluetooth keyboard...just the right slant when set up...the magnets keep it in place. The keyboard works great and the keys are placed well.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Quick

customer_reviews.title: super easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: this thing is a beast (in a good way). its convenient and easy to set up. also it looks legit like a little laptop which i love
customer_reviews.author: altonsharon

customer_reviews.title: Initial impressions are very good!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this keyboard set up with my Galaxy Tab S 10.5, and so far this is exactly what I was looking for! The case is incredibly slim, the keyboard is small but comfortable, and (most importantly) it works! Setup was a breeze as well. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Great protector both aesthetically pleasing and durable
customer_reviews.text: Great protector both aesthetically pleasing and durable, but very hard to take off if you so choose and the non-nylon part scratches easily and leaves a noticeable white mark. Additionally, the keyboard is cheaply made and wouldn't endure long-term use, nor would it be practical to use on a daily basis with ease. For the price I would still recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cjones

customer_reviews.title: USPS is the worst
customer_reviews.text: Would have been nice if I could enjoy this item but all I received was an empty box! I don't know when or where the case got stolen but now I have to order another one and pray that USPS will deliver my package instead of stealing it! Overall I know this product will be great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought it sooner
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a couple years after I bought my tablet. I wish I had bought it sooner. Turns my tablet into a "real computer", making it easier to write emails, and do other work on my tablet. It replaced my older case, and easily supports the tablet when working on it. Only thing to remember is to recharge the keyboard every few days, with the same charger as all the Samsung products use. Best money I've spent on an android accessory.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: ... various cases and this is by far the very best. It is rigid so it doesn't get bent ...
customer_reviews.text: I have tried various cases and this is by far the very best. It is rigid so it doesn't get bent or warped or stretched over time and the magnet not only snaps it shut, but it also holds it firmly in the upright landscape position. The keyboard is smaller than normal but can be adapted to easily. The only thing I would change is to somehow factor in a swivel functionality to allow it to be perched upright in portrait position for placing on a table or airplane seat tray for easy reading.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine S.

customer_reviews.title: My 2nd one
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and easy to connect. I had to buy another one because my daughter dropped the old one and lost 2 keys and it wouldn't charge anymore after 4 years of my daughter's abuse.
customer_reviews.author: BoricuaQueen

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second keyboard. The first one did a very good job surviving 3 kiddos under 5. It would be even better if the keys had the option to illuminate in the dark. I am unable to use it in dimly lit areas.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work with Samsung Galaxy Tablet S just fine, in fact I'm using it now. A short call to Logitech was required to get it started because the instructions that are included in the box are minus point s--t. Once that was cleared up everything went smoothly. Let's face it, the price was outstnding and I'm enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Fichtl

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous accessory for the Samsung Tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely brilliant. Wonderful key response. It turns the wonderful Samsung Galaxy Tab S into a mini laptop. When the tablet dies, I hope to fit a replacement tablet into it....with duct tape if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: caribbean sailor

customer_reviews.title: I was happy to find the same replacement many years after
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd tablet cover, the first one held up for many years until the magnetic strip broke. I was happy to find the same replacement many years after. Stays charged for long durations, stays up, works great!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: It's the perfect tablet holder plus a keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a while now and I love it. It basically turns my Samsung TabS into a simple laptop. It protects the tablet really well and the keyboard is compact yet the keys are large enough for my big fingers. I really don't have anything negative to say about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Turns myS-PAD into a laptop
customer_reviews.text: Great, durable and protective keyboard. Hope they make some more. I have had two. First one lasted about 2 years. But at that price-great protection and functionality. Used on many airline flights watching movies on the pull down table. Effectively converts my S-PAD to a laptop.
customer_reviews.author: PNW Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Ok keyboards but too expensive
customer_reviews.text: I really like this keyboard, but I feel like it is very over priced. I usually don't use it a whole bunch but when I do it works well. I kinda wish that I would have tried one of the ones that were way less expensive. I like how it makes my Tab S feel secure but then I also don't like the fact that it makes it feel bulky. It really takes away from the sexy feel of the beautiful tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Christina S.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying.
customer_reviews.text: Battery life almost makes it useless. Average ease of use. Freezes at times. Fortunately you could flip screen off, then on, and you could be where you left off.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Proske

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: This case is fantastic! The magnet catches and holds very well. I was worried about the tablet sliding but it's rock solid. The keyboard is a good size and everything flows well. No delay between typing and seeing the characters pop up. This case is everything I needed it to be.
customer_reviews.author: JHReformed

customer_reviews.title: Get this case, you'll love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet keyboard/case. I've had many compliments on it and it makes it so much easier to use the tablet. The bluetooth keyboard is almost full size and has very good key sensitivity. It folds over the tablet to create a protective case when travelling with it. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Houghtaling

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Fast response while typing. If you close the case the keyboard will go dormant but will come back in about a second after pushing a key. The search key is very nice and will allow you to go right to the search bar without having to use the touchscreen. If off the tablet will detect it in about a second after it's turned on. I do wish it was wider, but that's unfortunately the nature of a tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Kirby Thurston

customer_reviews.title: Got four; love 'em
customer_reviews.text: Got four of these, on four Samsung Tab S units. Love em. Much, much thinner and lighter than the iPad and keyboard we had. Actually, this tablet/cover + tablet is about the same weight and thickness as the iPad 3 with no keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: GaHillBilly

customer_reviews.title: Solid and a perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints. It works perfect and it's built well.
customer_reviews.author: Luke D Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard, nice and quiet, easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is great! Keys are a little smaller and closer together than your traditional keyboard but once you get the feel of it, it seems real natural. Keys are quieter than I expected which was a pleasant surprise. You can just barely hear the taps of regular keys but the spacebar seems to be the louder one but even that's still really quiet. Really responsive with the Tablet S and setup was a breeze. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: David A.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price and veru well made
customer_reviews.text: Synched up quick and easy. Although I only turn it on when I need it, it hasn't needed to be recharged in 3 months. Sturdy nice cover. Only negative, is that there is no "latch" to keep it from opening on its own... the magnet is not strong enough to keep the cover closed.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Wrape

customer_reviews.title: GREAT case.
customer_reviews.text: REALLY nice case/keyboard for the tab S. So nice to have the keyboard. Battery life is good. Weight is reasonable. Pairs easily and keeps the connection. Charges reasonably quickly. Locks very positively in the upright position. Smart cover wakes the tablet when the cover is opened. If the keys had a backlight option, it would be 5+ stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastic, very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, works great, nice comfortable keyboard for the price just do it you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Hector A.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, good-looking, and it works!
customer_reviews.text: It is thin and relatively light weight considering it includes a complete keyboard. I like that it has varied ways to prop the tablet up for viewing. It is very good quality and is quite nice looking for its modest price..
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to setup and works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: It is a must buy! Very easy to setup and works like a charm. The only thing I could say is that I wish that it had a protective flap to close the tablet when you are walking with it. I am afraid that it might fall out. It seems pretty secure, but without that protective flap that covers the tablet to the keyboard, it is an accident waiting to happen. Nonetheless, buy it! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: PCH Boss

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one we have ordered. It gets used a lot and has really held up. The first one lasted 2 years before the keys started falling out. Hopefully this one will too. Works great with my Samsung Galaxy Tab Pro.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is incredible!
customer_reviews.text: The battery on this keyboard is incredible! I haven't charged it in two weeks of use and I accidentally left it on for a couple days. I have pretty large hands, my golf glove is an XLarge and usually tight, and I could type on this comfortably. It's obviously smaller than a standard keyboard, but the key spacing made it such that I never 'fat fingered' a key.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Very Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Magnet is too weak. Can't use spell check with this thing, which makes it almost useless. I don't know if there is a better product out there, but after a year of daily use with this thing, I can tell you it's not very good.
customer_reviews.author: H. Peak

customer_reviews.title: Nice at first but very poor battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in June of 2015. Battery will no longer charge. The only time I can use this is when the charging cable is plugged in. The battery cannot be replaced and there appears to be no diagnostic software available for the keyboard. So, unless I'm at my desk, the keyboard is simply a decent case but otherwise worthless. I'll have to check and see if Amazon or Logitech will do the right thing and offer to replace this item.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I purchase. The first one I bought lasted me years before some of the keys went out on me, but I honestly think was because my ex would use it with his filthy fingers and he was just very rough with it. I bought the second one and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: M.M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice if you're looking for a tablet keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely happy with my keyboard. It turned my Galaxy S tablet into a netbook. It is very comfortable to work on emails, revise documents and spreedsheets, handle class management, etc. The equipment itself is very light and it looks great. It is also very easy on your fingers. It feels like a real keyboard and the keys have a very solid and satisfying feel to them when you press them. At the price I got it, it was a steel. Also, I've been using it for months and so far I've only ever recharged it once.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Davila Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: I can type now, mom.
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome for turning a Samsung Galaxy into a mini computer. Battery hasn't run out on me yet after just one charge.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Frewert

customer_reviews.title: Great investment. Turns tablet into a netbook.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Great functionality and price. Typying on it is quite good. Adding this keyboard turns the tablet into a netbook... while protecting your investment with the durable cover.
customer_reviews.author: AJR

customer_reviews.title: Typical Logitech quality....
customer_reviews.text: Logitech....what can I say? Their products just "work". No fumbling through manuals, no online searches about "what went wrong", no contacting customer support.....their products just work. Straight out of the box it took all of about ten seconds to sync up to my Samsung Tab-S. Just a very sleek looking keyboard cover, exactly what I was looking for. Now I can use my Tab-S as a pseudo-laptop. Great job Logitech.....once again you really deliver
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice case and makes typing feel like you're using a ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice case and makes typing feel like you're using a small computer rather than a table. The only downside I could really see is that there didn't seem to be an easy way to keep the keyboard folded back if you weren't using it. That being said I'd recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Mike McEachron

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic case for Samsung S Tab
customer_reviews.text: Purchased another cheaper case for my Samsung S tab where the keyboard attached magnetically instead of being integrated. That one was OK but ultimately got returned. This case is fantastic. It fits my tablet exactly right, is a nice sturdy case and will protect the tab. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: no pen, but works great
customer_reviews.text: out of all that i tried, this was the sturdiest, offers the best protection and not real bulky. only charged it initially, not since and it's still works. Keyboard is sturdy and not too small to cause keying errors. Paired quickly and stays paired. only wish it cane with a pen.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!  Especially for a child!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson a few years back! He may have had this a lil longer before this one was broken too! ;(
customer_reviews.author: Ladid607

customer_reviews.title: I love this keyboard cover.  LOVE IT!  The best keyboard feel ever.
customer_reviews.text: I am totally in love with this keyboard cover. Initially I didn't want something that made my Tab S larger and heavier but this has the typing feel of a nice laptop. Totally transforms the TAB S 10.5 into a powerful workstation. I can comfortably touch type on this cover! That is a first for android for me.
customer_reviews.author: Upgrade Taos Computers

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: Love This will be apso buying one for my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky L Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just love how the keyboard and case has make the tablet do so much more and be protected from scratches! The batteries lasts a long time with one charge. It's easy to connect via bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: jk95066

customer_reviews.title: Neato
customer_reviews.text: Nice. No lag, easy pairing, folds up for tablet protection. Great battery life. 4 stars though because Logitech loves to put glossy plastic where fingers go. It scratches easy and a fingerprint magnet (the glossy lip on front). By far the best 3rd party keyboard for the sweet sweet galaxy tab S. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: THD1%

customer_reviews.title: It's a product you can depend on.
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for my use. The tablets manufacturer, has one similar that's powered by the tablet which reduces your tablet use, and costs a little more than three times what I paid for the Logitech type S.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’ve had it for 4 years! Still works as a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe I’m just reviewing this, but I’ve had this keyboard for 4 years now and it hasn’t disappointed me at all!! I highly recommend it!! I literally charge it once in a blue moon. The battery life on this keyboard is insanely good!
customer_reviews.author: Marlene V.

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made product!
customer_reviews.text: Fits great; almost make it look like a small purse of sort. Feel very solid to carry around. Love the touch pen comes with it (Been the Cell Phone engineer in SF Bay Area for 20 years :)
customer_reviews.author: TeamEnviro

customer_reviews.title: Utility
customer_reviews.text: I like the keyboard. It adds considerable weight to the overall tablet/cover system, but it's handy. My only complaint is that there is sometimes lag between pushing a key and seeing the corresponding letter show up on the screen. The rapid typist may need to slow down a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: For a brand name plus keyboard and work as a ...
customer_reviews.text: For a brand name plus keyboard and work as a protection case, you can beat the price if you need it.
customer_reviews.author: helloandy

customer_reviews.title: ... do e-mail while we are on travel - works great! Decent battery life and charges fairly quickly
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife's tablet so she could do e-mail while we are on travel - works great! Decent battery life and charges fairly quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good and lets you cross the line from tab to LT
customer_reviews.text: I would argue the thin and light part a bit. I got my wife the Samsung part and it's definitely thinner and lighter. Still, the KB isn't bad for the tight space, is easy to turn on and off, and is stingy with battery. I would also say you get better protection than the Samsung part.
customer_reviews.author: redhed

customer_reviews.title: Make sure it fits your type tablet
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but doesn't fit the 10" Samsung tablet like a glove that's for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P Gorski

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best I've owned.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a few tablet cases and this is probably the nicest because it's thin, it has a cool magnetic latch, and the upright folding mechanism is very convenient for typing.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Eglinton

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get a USB Cable with it, rendering it worthless. Does anyone know what kind I need?
customer_reviews.author: Bob Left

customer_reviews.title: Made for the Job
customer_reviews.text: Well made and very easy to use. Did not come with instructions but I turned it on and am up n running without a problem. Nice feeling keyboard and excellent flexibility.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Dagg

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this worried that it might not be good quality and i am glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this worried that it might not be good quality and i am glad I did. It is a thick and durable glass screen protector. I have had it on my tablet since day 1 and not a scratch on it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Leto Rcs

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding customer service
customer_reviews.text: I received this item in 2 days and am completely satisfied with my purchase! **Update** It's been less than 2 months since receiving this and one of the keys has already fallen off! Otherwise it does the job. **2nd Update** I contacted customer service and they had me send in the keyboard for a new one. They kept in contact with me by email and were very quick about sending me the replacement. I am very satisfied with my purchase and the outstanding customer service I received.
customer_reviews.author: SMonroe3

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work with tablet Samsung 10.5 how is written in text information
customer_reviews.author: Anitta

customer_reviews.title: I would have given it 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I can't figure out how to make it work. Will someone please help. Update: I figured out how to make it work somewhat now. The manufacturer should not take it for granted everyone just know how things work . Anyway, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: 66ring1

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but inconvenient
customer_reviews.text: This works well, but I don't like how difficult it is to snap the tablet in and out. I can easily imagine that it will break after repeated insert/remove cycles. I much prefer another case that lacks the keyboard, but has a built in hand strap.
customer_reviews.author: bblumberg

customer_reviews.title: Slim yet protects
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cover and the keyboard is very functional. I like the fact that it turns the screen off when I close it up. Very responsive keyboard with little to no lag time.
customer_reviews.author: Bear Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, easy to use and offers good protection to my tablet. I can recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Angus

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Seriously...EXACTLY what I need. No frills, good case, easy QWERTY keyboard
customer_reviews.author: Joe Rangel

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnets in case
customer_reviews.text: This unit is good but it has strong magnets. This prevents the tablet from being used as a compass, astronomy controller or drone controller.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Spoor

customer_reviews.title: Get One if you Have a Type-S
customer_reviews.text: Works great and the magnetic position locks make it easy to use. Wish I would have bought it sooner. Easy setup and the battery lasts a long time. Excellent product and I highly recommend it for anyone with a Samsung Type-S tablet.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Helpful option to tablets
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy! Has made using my tablet to reply to emails and take notes so much easier and faster. Great construction and battery life so far, only downside is that i use my tablet way to much now, which isn't bad.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Does not last
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these and it was defective shortly after arrival. It would not charge. The seller was very good about shipping me a replacement and it worked well until last week when it stopped working unless it was plugged in. I think I can hear the battery sliding around in it. I have now been through 2 of these in less than six months so I do not recommend it. I did really like it when it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Bastow

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This almost feels too professional for me but I absolutely love it. I don't recommend this if you have bigger fingers since typing can be a bit tricky on it but otherwise, I do adore it.
customer_reviews.author: Khardeen

customer_reviews.title: ... extremely well and I have to say I absolutely love it. I can't imagine having my tablet without ...
customer_reviews.text: I've now had this for a long time and it has held up extremely well and I have to say I absolutely love it. I can't imagine having my tablet without it.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: My only gripe is that if you're pressing too many ...
customer_reviews.text: My only gripe is that if you're pressing too many keys at once they stop working and you'll accidentally activate a function other than you intended.
customer_reviews.author: Ben M

customer_reviews.title: Fits and looks great, also has great response the only downsides for ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits and looks great, also has great response the only downsides for me: a) Cant adjust the tablet position only one position b) Really miss the backlit keyboard like Zagg in the note 8 version
customer_reviews.author: Jorimo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Happy With My Order... Works Great On My Tab S & Good Quality... Good Work, Logitech...
customer_reviews.author: Anish

customer_reviews.title: This is the best option!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, it has about two months and the first charge still powering it. It has a really good price compared with some other options and it can do better job!
customer_reviews.author: Cristobal C.

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard fits my Samsung Tab S 10.5 perfectly. I was able to pair it with the tablet without a hitch. The keyboard is made of good quality and works very well. I am really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: T Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Got a Tab S 10.5,Get This Case.
customer_reviews.text: If you own the Samsung Galaxy Tab S 10.5,this add a touch of class to the device. Bluetooth connects quick and is responsive. Battery life is also very good. Logitech is a good way to go if you need a Bluetooth case.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you have this tablet I feel like it's a must buy
customer_reviews.text: Everyone wants to know where I got my keyboard. I bought it day 1 with my tablet, and I never seem to have to charge it. If you have this tablet I feel like it's a must buy.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really nice and solid. Easy to connect physically and the Bluetooth connection. Going to make typing much easier.
customer_reviews.author: NKurth

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy stylus holder!
customer_reviews.text: I like the case in many ways, but the stylus holder pulled off the case in no short order! There is no way to repair it either. I would look around for another case if I were someone who uses a stylus.
customer_reviews.author: hfdjr

customer_reviews.title: Best ones we've found so far
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a bluetooth keyboard case, not a wireless mouse. Best ones we've found so far.
customer_reviews.author: E. James

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard/cover pleasantly surprised me. I have an older different Logitech keyboard that I use with my iPad, but this version mated with my Samsung Tab S 10.5 is a home run!
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Easy to set up and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: F. Kallas

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Very durable and lightweight. Easy to connect and turn off and on. The battery lasts and incredibly long time although if I accidentally keep the Bluetooth on my tablet on when not in use my tablet battery will of course drain a bit faster. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine K Locey

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: This gets the job done. It's very solid and works well.
customer_reviews.author: MsLasha

product_meta.title: Logitech 920-006401 Type S Folio Keyboard Case for Samsung Galaxy Tab S 10.5 - Black
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Standard PackagingLogitech type - S thin and light protective keyboard case lets you create explore and say more with your Samsung galaxy Tab s 10.5.
feature_bullets: Built-in Bluetooth keyboard: Well-spaced keys, Android shortcuts and auto wake/sleep for great typing anytime, anywhere
Thin and light design: Precision engineering and state-of-the-art materials make this keyboard case amazingly thin
Dual-view stand: Holds your tablet upright for typing and chatting or flat for browsing and reading
Essential Protection System (E.P.S.): Covers both the front and back of tablet; protects against accidental bumps, scratches and spills
Tablet Compatibility: For Samsung Galaxy Tab S 10.5

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars711 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
